steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 1), increase(2)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(8), 2), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(6), 1), number_in_box(4)), then_go_to_step(4), then_go_to_step(2)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(9), 1), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(9), 1), number_in_box(5)), then_go_to_step(8), then_go_to_step(6)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(6), number_in_box(1), put_result_into_box(8)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(6), 1), number_in_box(7)), then_go_to_step(3), then_go_to_step(5)),
Put(number_in_box(2), into_box(2)),
Put(number_in_box(1), into_box(3)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 8?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在8号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Change Instruction 6: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 2
Change Instruction 8: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 6 greater than ( number in box 4 )
Change Instruction 9: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 9 greater than ( number in box 5 )
Multiply: ( number in box 6 ) * ( number in box 1 ), put result into box 8.
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 6 greater than ( number in box 7 )
Put ( number in box 2 ) into box 2
Put ( number in box 1 ) into box 3
desc_zh: 更改指令6：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加2
更改指令8：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令6中第1个盒子的编号比4号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令9：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令9中第1个盒子的编号比5号盒子中的数字大吗
相乘：6号盒子中的数字*1号盒子中的数字，将结果放在8号盒子中。
判断：指令6中第1个盒子的编号比7号盒子中的数字大吗
将2号盒子中的数字放在2号盒子中
将1号盒子中的数字放在3号盒子中
